skills.skill: Ability to multi-task and set priorities
Knowledge in Agile, SAP, Oracle, Numbers, Keynote, and Pages

duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for material planning, forecasting, and readiness to enable technology development, new product development, supply qualification, and factory readiness.
Manage materials budget planning and spend management through partnering with Finance and Engineering.
Lead clear to build (CTB) for pre-production build phases and propose optimized supply planning to ensure on-time build schedule.
Work closely with Engineering to manage multiple or alternate source qualifications through build management.
Lead NPI materials process improvement and daily or weekly supply planning meetings with Manufacturer Partners.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA with 1-3 years or comparable professional experience
